snippet: Spain approved several measures to crack down on tax fraud, seeking to reassure investors that it can replenish its coffers amid a $35 billion squeeze in the budget.
abstract: Spanish government approves a number of measures to crack down on tax fraud as part of its effort to reassure investors that it can replenish the public coffers by bringing to the surface some of the country’s hidden wealth.
lead_paragraph: Spain approved several measures to crack down on tax fraud, seeking to reassure investors that it can replenish its coffers amid a $35 billion squeeze in the budget.

headline.seo: Spain Targets Tax Fraud to Counter a Recession
